sqlQuery.name: PreWave Audit
sqlQuery.sqlText:
/* PRE-WAVE report
A Report to capture any conditions that will prevent an order been waved correctly 1. Items with stock in the warehouse that do not have a forward pick location assigned 2. Foward Pick Locations with inventory in the location but that have the "Empty" flag set to yes 3. All Pick locations that have Expired product in it 4. Items that have a larger TiHi than the Location 5. Items whose pallet weight (or case weight bottle pick tower) that exceeds the Pick Locations max weight 6. Items whose pick location that does appear in the search path */
-- Find all skus in the order well waiting to be planned. With ob_sku As ( SELECT od.whse_code, od.sku, pm.sku_desc FROM od_f od INNER JOIN om_f om ON od.whse_code = om.whse_code and od.ob_oid = om.ob_oid and od.ob_type = om.ob_type and om.ob_ord_stt = 'HOLD' INNER JOIN pm_f pm ON od.whse_code = pm.whse_code and od.sku = pm.sku group by od.whse_code, od.sku, pm.sku_desc ),
-- 1. Items with stock in the warehouse that do not have a forward pick location assigned item_noFP As ( select distinct iv.whse_code , iv.sku , 'N' as FPAssigned , pm.custom_char_4 as 'Container Type' , (select sum(floor(od1.ord_qty/pm1.qty1in2)) 'CASES' from od_f od1,pm_f pm1 where od1.sku = pm1.sku and od1.whse_code = pm1.whse_code and pm1.sku = pm.sku and pm1.whse_code = pm.whse_code group by od1.sku) 'CASES' ,(select floor(sum(od1.ord_qty%pm1.qty1in2)) 'BOTTLES' from od_f od1,pm_f pm1 where od1.sku = pm1.sku and od1.whse_code = pm1.whse_code and pm1.sku = pm.sku and pm1.whse_code = pm.whse_code group by od1.sku) 'BOTTLES' from iv_f iv, pm_f pm where iv.whse_code = pm.whse_code and iv.sku = pm.sku and not ( pm.custom_char_2 like 'X%BO' --Removes NSWP OR ( pm.custom_char_7 like '%|1098 %' and (pm.sku_desc like 'SO %' or pm.sku_desc like 'OP %' )) ) --Removes Spec Order and iv.sku not in ( select lc.sku from lc_f lc where lc.loc_type = 'FP' and iv.whse_code = lc.whse_code ) and exists (select sku from ob_sku where ob_sku.sku = iv.sku and ob_sku.whse_code = iv.whse_code) --Only Items that have an Order in the well and not exists (select iv.loc from iv_f iv1 join lc_f lc on iv1.whse_code = lc.whse_code and iv1.loc = lc.loc where iv1.sku = pm.sku and lc.whse_section = 'S-NSWP') ),
-- 2. Foward Pick Locations with inventory in the location but that have the "Empty" flag set to yes Item_emptyFP As ( select lc.whse_code, lc.sku, lc.loc as FalseEmptyPickLoc from iv_f iv, lc_f lc where iv.whse_code = lc.whse_code and iv.loc = lc.loc and iv.qty > 0 and lc.loc_type = 'FP' and lc.empty = 'Y' and iv.sku in ( select sku from ob_sku where ob_sku.whse_code = iv.whse_code ) ),
-- 3. All Pick locations that have Expired product in it item_expired As ( select lc.whse_code, lc.loc as ExpiredLocation, iv.sku, iv.product_exp_date as ExpiredDate from iv_f iv, lc_f lc, pm_f pm where iv.whse_code = lc.whse_code and iv.loc = lc.loc and iv.whse_code = pm.whse_code and iv.sku = pm.sku and lc.loc_type = 'FP' and iv.product_exp_date - pm.exp_lead_time < CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) and iv.sku in ( select sku from ob_sku where ob_sku.whse_code = iv.whse_code ) group by lc.whse_code, lc.loc, lc.loc_type, iv.sku, iv.product_exp_date ),
-- 4. Items that have a larger TiHi than the Location item_TiHiEx As ( select pm.whse_code, pm.sku, pm.custom_numeric_1 as TI, pm.custom_numeric_2 as HI, lc.loc as ExTiHiLocation, lc.max_fp_cap as MaxFPCapacity, lc.repl_uom as UOM from pm_f pm, lc_f lc where pm.whse_code = lc.whse_code and pm.sku = lc.sku and lc.loc_type = 'FP' and lc.area not in (SELECT DISTINCT wsp.custom_char_01 FROM wms_system_properties_ldb AS wsp WHERE wsp.property_name = 'BOTTLE_PICK_AREA' AND wsp.whse_code = lc.whse_code) and lc.repl_uom like 'CASE%' and pm.custom_numeric_1 * pm.custom_numeric_2 > lc.max_fp_cap and lc.sku in ( select sku from ob_sku where ob_sku.whse_code = lc.whse_code ) ),
-- 5. Items whose pallet weight (or case weight bottle pick tower) that exceeds the Pick Locations max weight -- Removed bottle pick tower compare, since only pallet weight for pick location is required as by Craig item_weighEx As ( select lc.whse_code, lc.sku, lc.loc as ExWeighLocation from pm_f pm, lc_f lc where pm.whse_code = lc.whse_code and pm.sku = lc.sku and lc.loc_type = 'FP' and lc.area not in (SELECT DISTINCT wsp.custom_char_01 FROM wms_system_properties_ldb AS wsp WHERE wsp.property_name = 'BOTTLE_PICK_AREA' AND wsp.whse_code = lc.whse_code) and (( pm.uom2 = 'PALLET' and pm.wgt2 > lc.wgt ) OR ( pm.uom3 = 'PALLET' and pm.wgt3 > lc.wgt ) ) and lc.sku in ( select sku from ob_sku where ob_sku.whse_code = lc.whse_code ) ),
-- 6. Items whose pick location that does not appear in the search path item_notInSearchPath As ( select lc.whse_code, lc.sku, lc.loc as NotInSearchPathLocation from lc_f lc where lc.loc_type = 'FP' and lc.whse_section not in ( select distinct ws.whse_section from ws_f ws where ws.whse_code = lc.whse_code ) and lc.sku in ( select sku from ob_sku where ob_sku.whse_code = lc.whse_code ) group by lc.whse_code, lc.sku, lc.loc ),
-- Construct the Pre-Wave report PreWave_rpt As ( select ob.whse_code as Warehouse, ob.sku as Item, ob.sku_desc as Description, FPLocationAssigned = ISNULL(noFP.FPAssigned, ''), OrderQuantity = ISNULL( CAST(noFP.CASES as nvarchar(10)) + ' CASES' + ' / '+ CAST(noFP.BOTTLES as NVARCHAR(10)) + ' BOTTLES', ''), FalseEmptyFPLocation = ISNULL(CAST (STUFF( (SELECT DISTINCT '; ' + emFP.FalseEmptyPickLoc FROM item_emptyFP emFP WHERE emFP.whse_code = ob.whse_code AND emFP.sku = ob.sku FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') as NVARCHAR(512)), ''), ExpiredLocationExpDate = ISNULL(CAST (STUFF( (SELECT DISTINCT '; ' + expd.ExpiredLocation + '/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), expd.ExpiredDate, 120) FROM item_expired expd WHERE expd.whse_code = ob.whse_code AND expd.sku = ob.sku FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') as NVARCHAR(512)), ''), WeighExceedLocation = ISNULL(CAST( STUFF( (SELECT DISTINCT '; ' + wEx.ExWeighLocation FROM item_weighEx wEx WHERE wEx.whse_code = ob.whse_code AND wEx.sku = ob.sku FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') as NVARCHAR(512)), ''), TiHiExceedLocation = ISNULL(CAST (STUFF( (SELECT DISTINCT '; ' + THEx.ExTiHiLocation + '/' + THEx.UOM + '/Max:' + CAST(THEx.MaxFPCapacity AS NVARCHAR(20)) + '(Ti:'+ CAST(THEx.Ti AS NVARCHAR(20)) + ', Hi:' + CAST(THEx.Hi AS NVARCHAR(20)) + ') ' FROM item_TiHiEx THEx WHERE THEx.whse_code = ob.whse_code AND THEx.sku = ob.sku FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') as NVARCHAR(512)), ''), NotInSearchPathLocation = ISNULL(CAST (STUFF( (SELECT DISTINCT '; ' + noSearch.NotInSearchPathLocation FROM item_notInSearchPath as noSearch WHERE noSearch.whse_code = ob.whse_code AND noSearch.sku = ob.sku FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') as NVARCHAR(512)), '') from ob_sku ob LEFT JOIN item_noFP noFP on ob.whse_code = noFP.whse_code and ob.sku = noFP.sku LEFT JOIN item_emptyFP emFP on ob.whse_code = emFP.whse_code and ob.sku = emFP.sku LEFT JOIN item_expired expd on ob.whse_code = expd.whse_code and ob.sku = expd.sku LEFT JOIN item_weighEx wEx on ob.whse_code = wEx.whse_code and ob.sku = wEx.sku LEFT JOIN item_TiHiEx THEx on ob.whse_code = THEx.whse_code and ob.sku = THEx.sku LEFT JOIN item_notInSearchPath as noSearch on ob.whse_code = noSearch.whse_code and ob.sku = noSearch.sku where NOT (FPAssigned is NULL and FalseEmptyPickLoc is NULL and ExpiredLocation is NULL and ExWeighLocation is NULL and ExTiHiLocation is NULL and NotInSearchPathLocation is NULL) group by ob.whse_code, ob.sku, ob.sku_desc, noFP.FPAssigned, noFP.CASES, noFP.BOTTLES )
select * from PreWave_rpt order by Warehouse, Item;

sqlQuery.name: Warehouse List
sqlQuery.sqlText: select whse_code as Warehouse from so_f
